Functional Programming

Data cleaning exercise. A dataset of a questionnaire that the students filled in during the Information Design Datavisualization-course, is fetched and cleaned using filters based on functional programming principles.

Description

Using D3.js, a 'dirty' dataset with survey data from a questionnaire that a group of students filled in during the Information Design Datavisualization-course is fetched.

Then, the dataset is cleaned using functional patterns and following general functional programming principles.

This project's focus is on data manipulation; a large 'dirty' dataset is server-side cleaned by using functional programming patterns in ES6. Then, the data is put into usable elements, some nice styling added and then using Eleventy converted to a cool, visual overview.

Technologies
